comment.author: 13094049@N07
comment._content: Minas Geraes, or Minas Gerais is a Brazilian state.

comment.author: 13160102@N07
comment._content: Minas Gerais também foi o nome escolhido para um dos navios brasileiros do início do século XX.

comment.author: 25308510@N08
comment._content: Brazilian battleship commissioned in 1910 and not struck until the end of 1952. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazilian_battleship_Minas_Geraes

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
Everyone:

Thank you for your comments!  While Minas Geraes was the name of this ship and so should remain the spelling in the caption, it makes sense to add the modern spelling of Minas Gerais to the record for those searching by that term.  We'll add that when we update the record.

comment.author: 85081405@N00
comment._content: MINAS GERAIS aircraft carrier, Brazilian Navy, now decomissioned.
